duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with customers to estimate product pricing and availability and accurately record quotations.
Assist and communicate with assigned National Accounts over the phone and stay extremely organized while multitasking.
Follow up on open order sales and open quotation reports once a week.
Attend in-person meetings and customer events as needed in conjunction with the local Product Support Representative.
Develop a working knowledge of the competition and their ongoing sales strategies.
Provide correct customer data and other sales data for assigned accounts into a computer database.
Develop and maintain relationships with all key contacts at each customer location.
Analyze sales data across assigned accounts to identify trends and recommend business synergies.
Develop and strengthen business relationships with key National Account personnel.
Occasional travel for Trade shows and seminars.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree from an accredited college or university or equivalent experience.
